languages.text: {n}Старуха беспокойно пожевывает губы.{/n} "Это лишь частичное удовлетворение запроса, но..." {n}Она бросает быстрый взгляд на Кибеллу.{/n} "Едва ли кто-то кроме вас верит, что кардинал переживет испытание культа смерти. А если все произойдет, как вы предполагаете, кардинал отступит от своего намерения, и его паства не лишится святого".

traits.locale_text: "Согласно положению о конфронтации сторон, признав правым одного ответчика, вы тем самым объявляете преступником второго. Лекс Империалис, том 57, параграф 96/40", {n}— поправив пальцем окуляр, машинально добавляет Префект.{/n} "А преступники заслуживают лишь одного — казни во славу Императора".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха беспокойно пожевывает губы.{/n} "Это лишь частичное удовлетворение запроса, но..." {n}Она бросает быстрый взгляд на Кибеллу.{/n} "Едва ли кто-то кроме вас верит, что кардинал переживет испытание культа смерти. А если все произойдет, как вы предполагаете, кардинал отступит от своего намерения, и его паства не лишится святого".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. And if everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

{n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. And if everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

{n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. And if everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

{n}The old woman smiles with an almost audible creak.{/n} "Ruling for one of the sides inherently means you are convicting the other side of a crime. And criminals only deserve one thing: execution in the Emperor's name. Or do you consider yourself above the Lex Imperialis?"

"As stated in regulation 'On the Parties' Confrontation,' ruling for one of the sides inherently means you are convicting the other side of a crime. Lex Imperialis, Volume 57, paragraph 96/40," {n}the prefect declares mechanically, adjusting her ocular lenses.{/n} "And criminals only deserve one thing: execution in the Emperor's name."

{n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. And if everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

{n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

{n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau kaut ängstlich auf ihren Lippen.{/n} "Das gewährt die Anfrage nur in Teilen, aber ..." {n}Sie wirft Kibellah einen kurzen Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr seid vermutlich {mf|der|die} Einzige, {mf|der|die} glaubt, dass der Kardinal die Tortur des Kultes überleben wird. Sollte alles wie geplant vonstatten gehen, wird der Kardinal seine Absichten fallen lassen und seine Herde wird nicht ihres Heiligen beraubt."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau kaut ängstlich auf ihren Lippen.{/n} "Das gewährt die Anfrage nur in Teilen, aber ..." {n}Sie wirft Kibellah einen kurzen Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr seid vermutlich {mf|der|die} Einzige, {mf|der|die} glaubt, dass der Kardinal die Tortur des Kultes überleben wird. Sollte alles wie geplant vonstatten gehen, wird der Kardinal seine Absichten fallen lassen und seine Herde wird nicht ihres Heiligen beraubt."

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme se mord les lèvres d'un air inquiet.{/n} « Voilà qui ne répond qu'en partie à sa requête, mais... {n}Elle jette un bref regard en direction de Kibellah.{/n} Vous êtes probablement la seule ici à croire que le cardinal survivra aux tourments infligés par le culte de la mort. Quoi qu'il en soit, si tout se passe comme vous l'envisagez, il renoncera à ses projets et ses ouailles n'auront pas à déplorer la perte de leur saint patron. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille femme se mord les lèvres d'un air inquiet.{/n} « Voilà qui ne répond qu'en partie à sa requête, mais... {n}Elle jette un bref regard en direction de Kibellah.{/n} Vous êtes probablement la seule ici à croire que le cardinal survivra aux tourments infligés par le culte de la mort. Quoi qu'il en soit, si tout se passe comme vous l'envisagez, il renoncera à ses projets et ses ouailles n'auront pas à déplorer la perte de leur saint patron. »

languages.text: {n}老妇人焦虑不安地咬着嘴唇。{/n}“这仅仅满足了主教大人的部分要求，不过……”{n}她飞快地瞥了绮贝菈一眼。{/n}“或许，只有您相信主教大人能从拜死教的考验中存活下来。如果一切如您所愿，相信主教大人会放弃求死的念头，而他的信徒们也不会失去他们的圣人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人焦虑不安地咬着嘴唇。{/n}“这仅仅满足了主教大人的部分要求，不过……”{n}她飞快地瞥了绮贝菈一眼。{/n}“或许，只有您相信主教大人能从拜死教的考验中存活下来。如果一切如您所愿，相信主教大人会放弃求死的念头，而他的信徒们也不会失去他们的圣人。”

languages.text: {n}La anciana se muerde los labios con ansiedad.{/n} «Eso supone aceptar tan solo parte de su solicitud, pero...». {n}Lanza una mirada rápida a Kibellah.{/n} «Usted es probablemente la única persona que cree que el cardenal sobrevivirá a los ritos del Culto de la Muerte. Si todo sucede tal y como espera, el cardenal abandonará estas intenciones y su rebaño no perderá a su santo».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana se muerde los labios con ansiedad.{/n} «Eso supone aceptar tan solo parte de su solicitud, pero...». {n}Lanza una mirada rápida a Kibellah.{/n} «Usted es probablemente la única persona que cree que el cardenal sobrevivirá a los ritos del Culto de la Muerte. Si todo sucede tal y como espera, el cardenal abandonará estas intenciones y su rebaño no perderá a su santo».

languages.text: {n}老女は不安そうに唇を噛んだ。{/n}「要望の一部しか認められませんが…」{n}彼女はキベラを素早く一瞥した。{/n}「枢機卿がその死のカルトの試練を生き延びると信じているのは、おそらくあなた一人でしょう。すべてがあなたの思い描く通りに進めば、枢機卿はその意志を撤回し、彼の信徒たちも聖人を失わずに済みます」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

traits.locale_text: {n}老女は不安そうに唇を噛んだ。{/n}「要望の一部しか認められませんが…」{n}彼女はキベラを素早く一瞥した。{/n}「枢機卿がその死のカルトの試練を生き延びると信じているのは、おそらくあなた一人でしょう。すべてがあなたの思い描く通りに進めば、枢機卿はその意志を撤回し、彼の信徒たちも聖人を失わずに済みます」

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, kaygıyla dudaklarını kemiriyor.{/n} "Bu hüküm, talebi kısmen karşılasa da..." {n}Kibellah'ya hızlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kardinal'in bu ölüm tarikatı işkencesinden sağ çıkacağına inanan bir siz varsınız herhâlde. Her şey öngördüğünüz şekilde tecelli ederse kardinal fikrini değiştirir, cemaati de azizlerini yitirmemiş olur."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman chews her lips anxiously.{/n} "That grants the request only in part, but..." {n}She glances over quickly at Kibellah.{/n} "You are probably the only one who believes the cardinal will survive the death cult's ordeal. If everything happens as you envision it, the cardinal will back down from his intention, and his flock will not be bereft of their saint."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı kadın kaygıyla dudaklarını kemiriyor.{/n} "Bu hüküm, talebi kısmen karşılasa da..." {n}Kibellah'ya hızlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kardinal'in bu ölüm tarikatı işkencesinden sağ çıkacağına inanan bir siz varsınız herhâlde. Her şey öngördüğünüz şekilde tecelli ederse kardinal fikrini değiştirir, cemaati de azizlerini yitirmemiş olur."
